languages.text: "У Глейто бывали такие же конвульсии при неисправности аугментов". {n}Вдруг Соломон неожиданно зло добавляет:{/n} "Местные недоумки должно быть и не знают, как ухаживать за имплантами. Им ничего сложнее лопаты давать нельзя, не то что зверя доверить".

"I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."
languages.original_text: "У Глейто бывали такие же конвульсии при неисправности аугментов". {n}Вдруг Соломон неожиданно зло добавляет:{/n} "Местные недоумки должно быть и не знают, как ухаживать за имплантами. Им ничего сложнее лопаты давать нельзя, не то что зверя доверить".

traits.locale_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

"I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

"I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

"I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

"I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

"I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

languages.text: “格雷托的植入物出问题的时候，它也像这样抽搐过。”{n}索罗蒙开了口，随后突然愤怒地补充道。{/n}“我怀疑这个地方的白痴根本不知道该如何维护植入物。他们就不该碰任何比铁锹复杂的东西，不该乱折腾这头畜生。”
languages.original_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托的植入物出问题的时候，它也像这样抽搐过。”{n}索罗蒙开了口，随后突然愤怒地补充道。{/n}“我怀疑这个地方的白痴根本不知道该如何维护植入物。他们就不该碰任何比铁锹复杂的东西，不该乱折腾这头畜生。”

languages.text: «He visto a Glaito sufrir convulsiones similares cuando le fallan los auméticos», {n}dice Solomorne, y luego añade con un brusco arrebato de furia:{/n} «Dudo que los lugareños tengan la más recóndita idea de cómo reparar ciberimplantes. Deberían limitarse a sus arados y dejar en paz a estas bestias».
languages.original_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

traits.locale_text: «He visto a Glaito sufrir convulsiones similares cuando le fallan los auméticos», {n}dice Solomorne, y luego añade con un brusco arrebato de furia:{/n} «Dudo que los lugareños tengan la más recóndita idea de cómo reparar ciberimplantes. Deberían limitarse a sus arados y dejar en paz a estas bestias».

languages.text: "Glaito'nun ogmetikleri arızalandığında böyle kasıldığını görmüştüm." {n}Solomorne, sözlerine öfkeyle ekleme yapıyor.{/n} "Buralı aptalların implant bakımı yapmaktan zerre kadar anladığından şüpheliyim. Küreklerle yetinip hayvanı rahat bırakmalıymışlar."
languages.original_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'nun ogmetikleri arızalandığında böyle kasıldığını görmüştüm." {n}Solomorne, sözlerine öfkeyle ekleme yapıyor.{/n} "Buralı aptalların implant bakımı yapmaktan zerre kadar anladığından şüpheliyim. Küreklerle yetinip hayvanı rahat bırakmalıymışlar."

languages.text: 「グライトのオーグメティックが動作不良だったときに、そんな風に震えているのを見たことがある」{n}ソロモーンは、それから突然の怒りを込めて続ける。{/n}「現場の間抜けたちがインプラント保守の最初の手がかりを持っているとは思わない。奴らは、ショベルを握って、その獣を一人にさせておくべきだった」
languages.original_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトのオーグメティックが動作不良だったときに、そんな風に震えているのを見たことがある」{n}ソロモーンは、それから突然の怒りを込めて続ける。{/n}「現場の間抜けたちがインプラント保守の最初の手がかりを持っているとは思わない。奴らは、ショベルを握って、その獣を一人にさせておくべきだった」

languages.text: « J'ai déjà vu Glaito convulser comme ça quand ses augmétiques fonctionnaient mal, {n}commente Solomorne avant d'ajouter avec colère :{/n} Je doute que les péquenots d'ici aient la moindre idée de comment entretenir des implants. Ils auraient dû se contenter de continuer à creuser plutôt que de s'en prendre à cette pauvre créature. »
languages.original_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai déjà vu Glaito convulser comme ça quand ses augmétiques fonctionnaient mal, {n}commente Solomorne avant d'ajouter avec colère :{/n} Je doute que les péquenots d'ici aient la moindre idée de comment entretenir des implants. Ils auraient dû se contenter de continuer à creuser plutôt que de s'en prendre à cette pauvre créature. »

languages.text: "Glaito hatte solche Zuckungen, als seine Augmentationen defekt waren"{n}, sagt Solomorne und fügt dann mit plötzlichem Zorn hinzu:{/n} "Ich bezweifle, dass die Hinterwäldler hier wissen, wie man Implantate wartet. Die hätten bei ihren Schaufeln bleiben und das Tier in Frieden lassen sollen."
languages.original_text: "I've seen Glaito convulse like that when his augmetics were malfunctioning," {n}Solomorne says, then adds with sudden anger,{/n} "I doubt the local halfwits have the first clue about maintaining implants. They should have stuck to shovels and left the beast alone."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito hatte solche Zuckungen, als seine Augmentationen defekt waren"{n}, sagt Solomorne und fügt dann mit plötzlichem Zorn hinzu:{/n} "Ich bezweifle, dass die Hinterwäldler hier wissen, wie man Implantate wartet. Die hätten bei ihren Schaufeln bleiben und das Tier in Frieden lassen sollen."
